/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -ccbin=g++ -m64 -gencode arch=compute_80,code=sm_80 --generate-code=arch=compute_80,code=[compute_80,sm_80] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/ParallelSystems.dir/main.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/ParallelSystems.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -lcuda -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu" -L"/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
